Nepal

643 Licchavi (Suryavamsa) dynasty restored; usually called Malla dynasty after reign of Jayasthitirajamalladeva (1382-95) 1484 joint rulers divide the state into three kingdoms, named after their capitals Bhaktapura (Bhatgaon), Banikapura (Banepa), and Kantipura (Kathmandu) 1546 additional division creates kingdom of Lalitapura (Lalitapatan) 16.. Banikapura annexed by Bhaktapura 25 Sep 1768 the last ruler of Gorkha unifies the Kingdom of Nepal under the Shah (Saha) dynasty 1816 - 21 Dec 1923 de facto British protectorate 15 Jan 2007 State of Nepal 28 May 2008 Federal Democratic Republic of Nepal
